long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get more s*** done and be more productive with Hypermonkey!

Struggling to stay focused, manage your tasks, or feel overwhelmed? You're in the right place! Our extension is designed specifically for ADHD'ers, combining evidence-based strategies to help you stay on track and get more done. We aim to turn your ADHD into a superpower and unlock your potential!

Key Features:

Task Breakdown: We help you break down big todo's into smaller, manageable tasks to reduce overwhelm and increase focus.
Pomodoro Timer: Stay productive using the Pomodoro techniqueâ€”work for focused intervals followed by short breaks.
Body Doubling: Invite a partner to join in your session remotely, leveraging the power of accountability and co-working!
Customizable Sessions: Personalize the tasks you want to work on and break intervals based on your needs.
